itemDisplayName: VMSS deploy of IPv6 in Azure Virtual Network (VNET)
description: Create VM Scale Set with dual stack IPv4/IPv6 VNET and Std Load Balancer.
summary: This template demonstrates how to create a Virtual Machine Scale Set (VMSS) with dual stack IPv4/IPv6 VNET with 2 VMSS instances (default), Network Security Group with IPv6-specific rule, and a Standard Load Balancer with both IPv4 and IPv6 Public IPs.
